name: Attini
description:
A small ant comes across a failing colony quickly running out of food and materials. Can she help them find what they need to survive? Explore the world outside of the anthill to collect the items they desperately need. But keep an eye on the sun; night isn't kind to small creatures, and the anthill guards can only do so much to protect you.

Final build of our 2022 IGS project

Made in Unreal Engine 4 by Lauren Abbasspour, Maggie Hartman, and Anthony Schooley
